comment.name: AntdSliderBar
comment.title: 侧边导航
comment.usage: 需要用户快速导航至某一项内容集合，并可以在多个内容之间来回切换。

properties.name: styleBuilder
properties.funcSig: AntdSliderBarStyle Function(BuildContext context, AntdSliderBar widget, AntdSliderBarStyle defaultStyle, AntdMapToken token)

properties.name: onEdgeReached
properties.description: 当触碰到边界时的回调

properties.name: alignment
properties.description: 根据方向自动优化视图边界

properties.name: titlePlacement
properties.description: 标题和视图的对齐方式

demos.name: AntdSliderBarFitDemo
demos.title: 内容的高度

demos.name: AntdSliderBarTitlePlacementDemo
demos.title: 当内容滚动时标题栏如何对齐

demos.name: AntdSliderBarHapticFeedbackDemo
demos.title: 震动反馈

demos.name: AntdSliderBarEventDemo
demos.title: 事件

demos.name: AntdSliderBarTitleDemo
demos.title: 标题栏宽度和填充方式
demos.body:
class AntdSliderBarTitleDemo extends StatelessWidget {
  const AntdSliderBarTitleDemo({super.key});
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return DemoWrapper(child: [
      DemoTitle(
          title: "自定义标题栏宽度",
          child: SizedBox(
              height: 500,
              child: AntdSliderBar(
                  style: const AntdSliderBarStyle(
                      titleStyle: AntdBoxStyle(width: 200)),
                  items: _items))),
      DemoTitle(
          title: "每行都填充宽度",
          child: SizedBox(
              height: 500,
              child:
                  AntdSliderBar(fit: AntdScrollItemFit.fill, items: _items))),
      DemoTitle(
          title: "自动均分",
          child: SizedBox(
              height: 500,
              child:
                  AntdSliderBar(fit: AntdScrollItemFit.split, items: _items))),
      DemoTitle(
          title: "内容自适应",
          child: SizedBox(
              height: 500,
              child:
                  AntdSliderBar(fit: AntdScrollItemFit.child, items: _items)))
    ]);
  }
}

demos.name: AntdSliderBarStyleDemo
demos.title: 自定义样式
demos.description: 通过style 可以覆盖默认样式

demos.name: AntdSliderBarMoreDemo

comment.name: AntdSliderBarStyle
comment.title: 滑动选择器(SliderBar)的样式配置

properties.name: inherit
properties.description: 是否继承样式,如果为false则不会向上合并其他的样式

properties.name: contentStyle
properties.description: 未选中状态的标题样式

properties.name: titleStyle
properties.description: 未选中状态的标题样式

properties.name: indicatorStyle
properties.description: 未选中状态的指示器样式

properties.name: activeIndicatorStyle
properties.description: 选中状态的指示器样式

properties.name: activeCornerRadius
properties.description: 选中项的圆角半径（单位：像素）

comment.name: AntdSliderBarItem
comment.title: 滑动选择器(SliderBar)的单个选项定义

properties.name: content
properties.description: 自定义内容组件（优先级高于title）

properties.name: title
properties.description: 默认标题内容（当content为空时使用）
